answers.answer: Bump. Any mommys have Preeclymsia what were there symptoms???
I am not sure I just get light headed and I have to stop cause it sometimes gives me a bad headache

You might have just locked your knees when you were showering and blocked the blood return, I do it every once in a while. The most common side effects of preeclampsia are high blood pressure, swelling in legs, feet, hands, and/or face, and excessive weight gain.
I have preeclampsia. The symptoms are high blood pressure, protein in urine, changes in vision, pain on right side under rib, and abnormal blood work .
Do they detected when they pee test you on the appointments or do I have to mention it to my doc so they can do a special kind of test?
And if you think you have it call your OB immediately because if your vision is changing That could be the high blood pressure and that is extremely dangerous for you and your child!
And they do blood work and start you on a 24 hour urine culture to detect the amount of protein you have over that course of time.

This is my 2nd pregnancy with it. My symptoms were hands, face and feet swelled up huge and didn't go down with rest, extreme pain in right side just below rib, blinded by white spots, bp extremely high (170/140 with first, 160/90 with this one) over two readings at least a couple of hours apart, and protein in urine. Black spots or 'floaters' are usually a sign of low blood pressure. Had you been standing in the shower for a while? If your worries mention it to your dr and ask him to check your blood pressure. If you develop any other symptoms go and get checked out, nothing like peace of mind!

No I don't have any kind of swellings! Just headaches once in a while! I have an appointment on Wen ill mention it. Im really nervous thou because I changed doc and clinic and it's my first time seeing him!! ;/

Don't be afraid to speak up, it's their job to manage your pregnancy for the best possible outcome! I'm always embarassed to call my dr because I've seen him every week since I was 15wks due to my complications but every time I've caledl him its been serious and I've needed to be admitted to hospital. They can't help you if you don't speak up and if its nothing, there's nothing like reassurance from a professional.

If your BP is extremely high , you should be admitted because it can cause a stroke. Preeclampsia can develop into eclampsia....which you DO NOT WANT. Go get evaluated for BP, proteinuria, swelling, fetal surveillance.

I'm very glad I found this post today I went to the Dr she said I was at risk for this do to the bad migraines I get but my b.p. has always been normal when they check it my vision does change some time and do get dizzy a lot way happens if I do have this and wat can happen to my baby? I go in for blood work on the 28th but hearing this worried me

@mom_520 I get preeclamplsia in my pregnancies because I don't grow very good placentas. My babies can't get enough oxygen and nutrients which puts the placenta under a lot of pressure to work harder, which put stress on my liver, which leaks enzymes to my kidneys which leaks proteins giving the side effects of swelling, high blood pressure,  headaches, white spotsnin vision. Unfortunately,  there's not a lot they can do to prevent it or stop it until they remove the baby and the placenta but they can manage the symptoms with a aspirin and calcium to help the blood flow through the placenta, and blood pressure meds to keep the spots, swelling and high bp under control. Once the protein gets too much its a good indication the liver and kidneys are struggling so they tend to deliver, my son was born at 35wks, or your body decides for itself that its had enough and you can into preterm labour as what happened to me this time at 27wks (but they were able to stop it!). There is a lot they can do and it really dependa on how early in your pregnancy you developed it. Fingers crossed you don't have it and wishing you a smooth pregnancy!
@mummainoz it's really scared knowung you might have it.  ;/

question: Preeclymsia what's the symptoms ? How do they detect that? Im kinda getting scared I might have that.  I was taking a shower and my vision started to have black dots like kinda of dizzy kinda!!
title: preclmsia
